weekly picks (Nov 1 week 2023)

Posted on November 6, 2023 in 2023nov,  Daily t.me,  adsabs,  g scholar

A WordCloud of 2023 Nov 1st week collection

  1. s41467-023-42846-7 Heat current-driven topological spin texture transformations and helical q-vector switching (Nature Communications)

  2. PhysRevX.13.041027 Emergence of Classical Magnetic Order from Anderson Towers: Quantum Darwinism in Action (skyrmion antiskyrmion, PRX)

  3. PhysRevLett.131.197401 Inferring Microscopic Financial Information from the Long Memory in Market-Order Flow: A Quantitative Test of the Lillo-Mike-Farmer Model (PRL)

  4. PhysRevLett.131.196701 Acoustically Driven Magnon-Phonon Coupling in a Layered Antiferromagnet (Otani, PRL)

  5. s152 Probing an Antiferromagnet with Sound (Physics)

  6. PhysRevLett.131.196401 Unraveling Hidden Charge Density Wave Phases in $1T\text{\ensuremath{-}}{\mathrm{TiSe}}_{2}$ (PRL)

  7. 192 Decoding the Dynamics of Supply and Demand (Physics)

  8. PhysRevX.13.041026 Interaction-Driven Topological Phase Diagram of Twisted Bilayer ${\mathrm{MoTe}}_{2}$ (PRX)

  9. PhysRevLett.131.190401 Asymptotic Quantum Many-Body Scars (PRL)

  10. PhysRevLett.131.197001 Phase-Driving Hole Spin Qubits (PRL)

  11. 2208.00058 Magnetic skyrmions under confinement (skyrmion, arXiv)

  12. 2311.04188v1 Multi-band description of the upper critical field of bulk FeSe (arXiv)

  13. 2311.03558v1 Replication and study of anomalies in LK-99–the alleged ambient-pressure, room-temperature superconductor (arXiv)

  14. 2311.03640v1 Impact of the Ce $4f$ states in the electronic structure of the intermediate-valence superconductor CeIr$_3$ (arXiv)

  15. 2311.04094 Magnetism in AV3Sb5 (Cs, Rb, K): Origin and Consequences for the Strongly Correlated Phases (kagome, arXiv)

  16. 2311.04051 Optical drive of amplitude and phase modes of the condensate in excitonic insulators (arXiv)

  17. 2311.04000v1 Structural Transition and Magnetic Anisotropy in $\alpha$-RuCl$_{3}$ (arXiv)

  18. 2311.03915v1 Topological entanglement entropy to identify topological order in quantum skyrmions (arXiv)

  19. 2311.03445 Theory of fractional quantum anomalous Hall phases in pentalayer rhombohedral graphene moir\‘e structures (arXiv)

  20. 2311.04099 Magnetism in AV3Sb5 (A = Cs, Rb, K): Complex Landscape of the Dynamical Magnetic Textures (kagome, arXiv)

  21. 2311.03435 Signatures of hidden octupolar order from nonlinear Hall effects (arXiv)

  22. 2311.03727v1 Floquet second-order topological Anderson insulator hosting corner localized modes (Floquet, arXiv)

  23. 179 Comedy as a Tool to Demystify Science (Physics)

  24. 2311.03302 Exposing nontrivial flat bands and superconducting pairing in infinite-layer nickelates (arXiv)

  25. 2311.02494 Phonon-mediated unconventional $s$- and $f$-wave pairing superconductivity in rhombohedral stacked multilayer graphene (arXiv)

  26. 2311.03208 Engineering Majorana bound states in coupled quantum dots in a two-dimensional electron gas (arXiv)

  27. 2311.03193 Robust poor man’s Majorana zero modes using Yu-Shiba-Rusinov states (arXiv)

  28. 2311.02824 Strain induced flat-band superconductivity and symmetry breaking (arXiv)

  29. 2311.03334 Emergent magnetic order in the antiferromagnetic Kitaev model with a [111] field (arXiv)

  30. 2311.02619 Bulk-boundary-transport correspondence of the second-order topological insulators (arXiv)

  31. 2311.02155 PT-symmetric Non-Hermitian Hopf Metal (arXiv)

  32. 2311.02164 Exchange energy of the ferromagnetic electronic ground-state in a monolayer semiconductor (arXiv)

  33. 2311.02005v1 Local condensation of charge-$4e$ superconductivity at a nematic domain wall (nematic, arXiv)

  34. 2311.01858v1 Magnetic properties and spin dynamics in a spin-orbit driven Jeff= 1/2 triangular lattice antiferromagnet (effective Jhalf, arXiv)

  35. 2311.01735v1 Robust room temperature ferromagnetism in an itinerant van der Waals antiferromagnet (arXiv)
